generous.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who is generous is willing to give money, spend time etc, in order to help people or give them pleasure
generous.translation[0].definitions[0].e: my employer’s generous offer to pay the bill
She’s always very generous to the kids.
Jim is very generous with his time.
It was generous of them to ask Anna along.
generous.translation[0].definitions[1].d: larger or more than the usual size or amount
generous.translation[0].definitions[1].e: He had a well-shaped generous mouth.
generous.translation[0].definitions[2].d: sympathetic in the way you deal with people, and tending to see the good qualities in someone or something
generous.translation[0].definitions[2].e: She was generous enough to overlook my little mistake.
